kpi.name: M1010C208

kpi_info.title: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO CELL REPLACEMENT FOR RT
kpi_info.use: The number of inter-system HHO measurements cancelled due to Active Set Update caused by Cell Replacement for UEs with RT connection. UPDATED: When a soft handover branch replacement triggers the cancellation of inter-system HHO measurement.

kpi.kpi_alias: ISHO CANCEL DUE TO CELL REPLACEMENT FOR RT
